error.error-loading-company: The company could not be loaded. It could have been deleted by another user or the server is not responding.

company.no-child-units: There are no substructures for this structure yet

delete-dialog.general-do-you-want-to-delete: Do you really want to delete {{value}}?

contact.content: Do you have questions, suggestions, or problems with the Burning OKR Tool? You are welcome to contact us.
contact.content-with-link: In case of bugs or suggestions for improvement regarding the tool, please contact us via GitHub. If you would like BROCKHAUS AG to perform customization for you, or if you require consulting or any other service, please contact us via info@brockhaus-ag.de.
contact.title: How to reach us

digitalization.content: With Burning OKR, you digitally map all essential components of the OKR framework and create transparency across teams. The teams manage their own objectives and key results with Burning OKR and make their progress and successes visible. Furthermore, the hierarchies of your company can be made visible within the tool.
digitalization.title: Digitize your entire OKR process

features.content: Our OKR tool enables you to digitalize the OKR process and its result metrics in a holistic way, including all necessary features. In detail, Burning OKR offers...
features.perks-list:
• the authentication via Azure Active Directory or a local user management
  • the management of multiple companies (multitenancy)
  • the mapping of cycles, company structures, teams, objectives and key results
  • a progress indicator for Objectives and Key Results
  • a flexible individualization, including the designation of teams, the restriction of the maximum Key Result number, etc.
  • a data export as Excel spreadsheet
features.title: Innovative features

free-and-open-source.content: The application is completely free for corporate and private customers. In addition, you can view the open source code at any time on GitHub and adapt it to your needs. We are happy to assist you in this process. Make your customizations available as a pull request for the whole world!
free-and-open-source.title: Our free offer for you

further-information.content: For more information on the OKR Framework, please visit the AGILEVERSITY page of BROCKHAUS AG.
further-information.title: Learn more about the OKR Framework and OKR processes

installation.content: Burning OKR is easy to install on various platforms. We offer tutorials on how to install with...
installation.title: Easy installation

target-management.content: Objectives and Key Results are processed in cycles. Design the name, length and content of the cycles according to your wishes. Keep track of the productivity of OKR teams with the Objectives and Key Results progress bar.
target-management.title: Manage and control your company goals

visions.content: The agile OKR framework supports you in achieving strategic business goals through a structured goal-setting process. Short cycles and measurable goals promote regular evaluation of results and give you the opportunity to quickly modify your business model based on new information. With Burning OKR we offer you a powerful and user-friendly OpenSource tool to support you.
visions.title: Realize Visions with the help of OKR

welcome.content: Burning OKR supports you in achieving strategic corporate goals and promotes an agile and transparent corporate culture. The open source OKR tool is based on BROCKHAUS AG's many years of experience with the OKR framework.
welcome.title: Welcome to Burning OKR!

dialog-component.date-range-within-another-date-range: The start and end dates must not overlap with any other cycle range.
dialog-component.start-date-not-before-end-date: The start date cannot be before the end date.
dialog-component.start-equals-end: The start value must not be the same as the target value.

navigation-sidebar.cycle-not-started: This cycle has not yet started and can be processed in preparation.
navigation-sidebar.cycle-started: This cycle has already expired and is therefore closed - processing is only possible to a limited extent.

warning.no-smtp-link: This can severely limit the usability of the <br class="hidden-l-up">application.
warning.no-smtp-text: Warning: No SMTP server has been configured.

tooltip.edit-unit-name: Edit the name of the structure

submitted-topic-draft-action-button.approving-status-and-user: The status must be "Pending" and only an admin or an auditor can accept or reject

delete.message: Are you sure you want to delete draft topic {{name}}?
delete.title: Delete topic draft

edit-tooltip.status-and-user: The status must be "Pending" or "Draft" and only an admin or the initiator can edit
edit-tooltip.user: Only an admin or the initiator can edit

submitted-topic-draft-action-button.no-permission: Only an admin or an auditor can approve or reject

tooltip.only-admin-or-initiator-permission-to-de: Only the admin or the Initiator are able to delete this topic draft

button.tooltip-no-permission: Only the initiator of the topic draft or an admin can edit it. For this purpose, the topic draft must not have been approved or rejected.

snackbar.submit: Your topic draft has been sent for review.

set-azure-admin-init-state-form.set-azure-admin-subtitle: The following user will become the initial administrator.
set-azure-admin-init-state-form.other-user-notice: If you want to set another user as initial administrator, please log in with their account.

set-oauth-client-details-form.title: Configure Authentication
set-oauth-client-details-form.explanation: To use the local user database, you have to configure OAuth. It is important, to keep the Client-ID and the Client-Secret unique to any other application. All form fields have already been filled with meaningful data and a change of this data is only recommended for advanced users.
set-oauth-client-details-form.only-do-this-if-you-are-a-nerd-warning: Activate form. ⚠ Only do this if you know what you are doing ⚠
set-oauth-client-details-form.access-token-validity: Duration of the access token (in seconds)
set-oauth-client-details-form.refresh-token-validity: Duration of the refresh token (in seconds)
set-oauth-client-details-form.please-hang-on-the-server-is-beeing-conf: Please wait a moment while the server is beeing configured.

password-form.caps-lock-on: The caps lock key is active

reset-password.password-reset-email-has-been-send-out: An email to reset your password has been sent to the email address provided.

import-csv-dialog.description: This function allows you to import users with a CSV file. The CSV file must provide the user data in the following order: First name, last name, email, job title, department
import-csv-dialog.to-many-entries-warning: At least one entry has too many columns.
import-csv-dialog.duplicate-email-adresses-warning: There are duplicate email addresses in this record.
import-csv-dialog.name: Name

user-form.error-used-email: The email is already in use by another user.

logout.logged-out: You have been successfully logged out.
logout.redirect: You will be redirected in a moment.

no-mail-information.info: This can restrict the usability of the application.
